doc.title: Guardians of Angkor
doc.plot: Charles Higham and Sokorn Sin risk life and limb to visit the lost temples of Angkor which have been buried in land-mines for over 40 years. They discover that the temples have actually been spared of looting by the land-mines. But now that they are being removed the temples are being looted and the artifacts are being sold in the art markets of Bangkok.
